backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles, admin‑restricted product CRUD, and order requests with access control and price stored in paise.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old product structures to new ones without transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components related to fixing product price scaling to use paise consistently.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, and styling utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, CSS variables, and light/dark mode theme values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, ThemeProvider, layout, and global UI elements like Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component displaying an access denied message with a CTA returning to the shop.
frontend/src/components/AddToOrderContro: Component managing product quantity selection and adding/updating items in the order draft with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderReque: Admin panel listing order requests with totals, contact info, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductAdm: Admin product list with create, edit, delete, and stock‑toggle actions plus editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or editing products, handling form state, currency conversion, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing loading or denial screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and a caffeine.ai link with dynamic UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, cart count, login button, and mobile menu tied to auth and admin state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product image, details, price, stock status, and add‑to‑order controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductDiscovery: Search and scent‑filter bar with clear‑filters control for product browsing.
frontend/src/components/ProductImage.tsx: Product image component with fallback image and on‑error replacement.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting, and toggling stock of products using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile and admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider that manages identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDraft.ts: Manages a local-storage-backed draft order with item add/update/remove operations and price normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequests.ts: Fetches, submits, and deletes order requests while normalizing product prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID and normalizes its price.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all products or in-stock products and normalizes prices, integrating actor loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders an admin dashboard with tabbed views for managing products and viewing order requests.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmation message after an order request and provides a button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/OrderRequestPage.tsx: Handles order request submission, including item review, customer details, validation, and sending the request.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info with images, stock status, description, and controls for adding items to an order.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontCatalogPage: Displays the product catalog with search, scent filtering, and a hero section, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides utilities for converting, normalizing, and formatting INR prices using bigint values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme settings, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project version, features, issues, and current app state for an incense store app. Includes existing features, known issues, and admin/storefront requirements.
